annotation.TEXT: Too bad I don't have a fire flower, or this would go even faster!
15 seconds. Is this fast enough for you?
Overall epicness: ++++++++++++ 12 out of 20.
Nice! Thank you for cooperating, Lemmy!
Obviously, the bonus room is the reason why I need the cape. (I've seen a TAS that managed to pull it off without a cape, but that was a TAS. This is not!)
I'm trying to be somewhat fancy here, but this has gotten me killed numerous times!
Having made it through there, the rest is easier, but I still can't dawdle.
Epic-o-Meter: +++++ 5 out of 20.
So, how fast can I beat Ludwig?
If I had fireballs, it would be over already!
Well, that's interesting! I finished this castle in 60 seconds as well!
Whoops! Accidentally hit the slope. Well, it took me several tries to get to this point. I'm not redoing this just because of that!
BGM: Donkey Kong Land - Boss Battle
...If I'm quick, I can avoid waiting on this jump!
Epic-o-Meter: +++++++++++ 11 out of 20.
So, will Wendy be as cooperative as Lemmy was?
Very interesting in that it took me exactly 100 seconds!
This one is really tough! The only way this will be possible is if I get into the first door with 281 left, and that's not easy!
More unnecessary fooling around.
Castle 3: Enter the midpoint room as fast as I can.
Castle 1: Finish within 60 seconds, and without hitting the midpoint.
Huh? Roy resisted my first stomp for some reason. Well, I'm not letting you reach the wall!
Well, since I still have my cape, I can give you a quick level clear!
Now this one sounds more interesting!
Well, it wasn't that tough.
Well, I'll give it a good speed run anyway!
Castle 2: Clear within 70 SMW seconds, going through the bonus room along the way.
Good enough!
Hopefully, I can get lucky here...
Also, I can take flight here to save a little time.
Okay, now I can relax for a bit, but I will have to enter the boss room the instant I can, and finish him off ASAP!
Did I just enter that door while still ducking?! I have no idea how I did that!
Epic-o-Meter: ++++++++++++++ 14 out of 20.
Honestly? That's all? Come on. I normally only hit the block just once anyway. This could've been made much more interesting...
For the next one, a cape is required, so I went and got one offscreen.
Whoa! Close call there!
SMW challenge from Gizi64: A lot of things involving the 7 castles of Koopa!
Hey! One of the turn-block bridges didn't appear! Now things are a bit tougher.
If I failed to make it through that passage earlier, it would probably be impossible to get a time of 70 or better. Fortunately, I made it on my first try!
YES!!! It took me exactly 60 seconds! So yeah, if I was 1 second slower anywhere, it would not be possible! This took me several tries!
Only 46 seconds in so far, and it should only take around 15 to beat up Morton! So I've got this in the bag!
I'm going to duck jump to kill Larry as well.
Whoops! That's alright. I'm not hurt, and it didn't cost me much time.
Most importantly, bouncing or flying through this passage before it closes!
Of course, I have to avoid the midpoint, which just makes things trickier!
Epic-o-Meter: ++++++++++ 10 out of 20.
Nothing special here. Just avoid and/or whack the koopas while climbing.
Of course, there's no reason to hang around here. I just had to enter it.
Well, let's see how fast I can finish the rest of the level!
Total level time: 58 seconds. I did lose a few seconds to minor slip ups, but that's okay.
Also, ducking prevents cape spinning, so I gotta get Magikoopa to make openings for me here!
I'm going to take my time here, because rushing only gets me horribly killed in some gruesome way!
Castle 7: Once again stay ducking as much as possible, and once again don't get hurt or die in the block snake section.
Whoa! Almost got cut up badly there!
I have to wait for the blocks most of the time, so there's not very much I can do to speed things up. However...
P-switch BGM: Marble Madness - Practice Race
BGM: Madness Fortress
Castle 4: Clear quickly, only hitting the ON/OFF block once or twice.
Yeah, I had to stand briefly to get through the door.
Okay, that's it for the spike pillars, but there's still the second half of the castle remaining.
Since I have to stay ducking this time, there's no flying through this section!
Done! Challenge complete!
By the way, I tried doing this without hitting the block at all, and... Yeah, not even close! Mario became a pin cushion well before I reached the end!
Castle 6: Stay ducking as much as I can, and don't get hit by the spike pillars.
Now, this room is what will determine whether I can beat 70 seconds or not. I have to get to certain spots quickly in order to minimize waiting.
Whoa! Accidental dive bomb!
Castle 5: Clear the level quickly, and don't get hurt or die in the block snake section.
Too bad I can't spin jump. Otherwise, I could maybe take a shortcut here.
From the third castle onwards, no specific time requirements were set. I just have to try to clear them quickly.
Epic-o-Meter: +++++++++++++ 13 out of 20.
You can run under the first two Podoboos here, but you should jump over the third!
The boss fight took me 27 seconds, and the entire level took me 79 seconds.
I can grab a power up here, but it would've been more useful if the midpoint wasn't banned, because then, I'd have a flower that could help take out Iggy faster!
Making these jumps is trickier than it looks!
Okay, here goes...
